message.body: Make sure you save your receipts from printing the flyers so we can reimburse you.Â
I ordered printer ink so i can print em at home, can that be reimbursed?
It's probably a lot cheaper to print one and then photocopy the rest. How much is the ink?
It was $18, and they estimate that that can print 3000 pages, its a pretty efficient bw laser printer
Oh. Yea. Just do that then. My printer is a dinosaur and the ink is really expensive. I have no perspective. Do you have an invoice for it? Or some kind of receipt?
Oh. I have been in touch with the truffle girl. She's going to make spicy and aphrodisiac truffles for us! and Rose ones too!
